description: A massive tower within Enies Lobby that serves as the World Government's judicial headquarters. Contains multiple floors with various rooms including libraries, bathhouses, gardens, kitchens, and dungeons.

keyEvents.title: Rocketman Crashes Into Tower
keyEvents.description: The Rocketman sea train crashes directly through the front wall of the Tower of Justice, creating a massive entrance for the Straw Hats and their allies.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the climactic Tower of Justice battles during the Enies Lobby arc.

keyEvents.title: Battle Strategy Formation
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats split up throughout the Tower to engage CP9 members in one-on-one battles to find the keys to Robin's handcuffs.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the framework for all major CP9 vs Straw Hat confrontations.

keyEvents.title: Secret Passageway Discovery
keyEvents.description: Chimney discovers a hidden corridor within the Tower that leads toward the Gates of Justice, which Spandam used to escape with Robin.
keyEvents.significance: This secret passage will later prove crucial for Luffy's pursuit of Robin.

significance: The Tower of Justice is the central battlefield for the Enies Lobby arc, where each Straw Hat member faces off against CP9 agents in crucial one-on-one battles. It represents the heart of the World Government's judicial power.
